alert.note: Alert for Cass; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:19PM CST until January 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Mills County. In Nebraska, Cass and Saline Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions may impact Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
